description.narrative: The project will include the following components: (i) transmission system strengthening to further improve its energy efficiency and reliability and enable rural electrification in the Eastern, North Central, Southern and Uva provinces of Sri Lanka; (ii) rural electrification and distribution system improvement in the Eastern and Uva provinces of the country to expand access for the poor and rural households; and (iii) energy efficiency and renewable energy.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved coverage, efficiency and reliablility in service delivery

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Decrease in distribution losses from 11.02% in 2009 to 10.00% by 2016

description.narrative: Improved coverage, efficiency and reliablility in service delivery

title.narrative: Technical and commercial losses of the CEB network reduced from 14.6% of net generation in 2009 to 12.0% by 2016.

description.narrative: Improved coverage, efficiency and reliablility in service delivery

title.narrative: Increase in electrification ratio in Eastern Province from 67% in 2009 to 80% by 2016

description.narrative: Improved coverage, efficiency and reliablility in service delivery

title.narrative: 19 micro (< 300 kW) hydropower projects with total capacity of about 1.3 MW connected to the grid under net metering arrangements
